Two users reused a prime when generating their RSA keys—now their encrypted message 5089589092698955739910821451396504329705854545393471313887239649284469870197128824146741010474225178508050717397343161083890260730406414589075542097217572 risks exposure. Can you recover the plaintext?

The flag format is flag{...}
n=7037473993005889864733005200437013635899358073713263169676709447295538723095711505921505160988761036669678050561567107496595163652537585463161796298486047, n2=5274799149800529025825489160967467948369072940545978267498646475217283308892438343027609761195988493316666865570096760162835703946969796968132254883867789, e=1813130946690726996602264877906793929654052793351639417850346037371239556144136903357403407894259136687208078803119842110747506090102490906187875283539481

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{9kzidzvl}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 5089589092698955739910821451396504329705854545393471313887239649284469870197128824146741010474225178508050717397343161083890260730406414589075542097217572
vulnerability: shared prime
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common prime, computing GCD(n, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=7037473993005889864733005200437013635899358073713263169676709447295538723095711505921505160988761036669678050561567107496595163652537585463161796298486047, n2=5274799149800529025825489160967467948369072940545978267498646475217283308892438343027609761195988493316666865570096760162835703946969796968132254883867789, e=1813130946690726996602264877906793929654052793351639417850346037371239556144136903357403407894259136687208078803119842110747506090102490906187875283539481
extra_info: p=62274759982991566059840495270505732206060279985754317682371149839815288672019, q=113006842498115757975594233848217152089864903737692346951797810798226703334213, q2=84702039016146799458214451066785639021818242640737090479506829445936686180831, φ(n)=7037473993005889864733005200437013635899358073713263169676709447295538723095536224319024053664725601940559327677271182312871716987903416502523754306479816, φ(n2)=5274799149800529025825489160967467948369072940545978267498646475217283308892291366228610622830470438370329574198868881640209212538807918988846502909014940
